verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WHEN GOD MOVETH, NONE CAN STAY HIS
HAND;
When God moveth, none can stay His hand.
When God moveth in this land,
When God moveth, who shall stand?
When God moveth, none can stay His hand.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When God moveth by His tender Spirit,
When God moveth, His disciple heareth.
When God moveth in this land,
When God moveth, who shall stand?
When God moveth, none can stay His hand.
